scripts.dev: docker-compose -f dev-compose.yml up -d && docker exec -it renewal-center_appointment-api_1 npm run migrate:reset && docker exec -it renewal-center_appointment-api_1 npm run db:seed
scripts.compose: docker compose up -d --build && cd ./appointment-booking-api && npm run wait && npm run migrate:deploy
scripts.push:images: docker push dockterperry/appointment-api:v1 && docker push dockterperry/appointment-client:v1, && docker push dockterperry/appointment-nginx:v1
